name: Dragonborn
description: Humanoids with draconic ancestry, bearing the physical and magical traits of dragons

traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: Your lineage stems from a dragon progenitor. Choose the kind of dragon from the Draconic Ancestors table. Your choice affects your Breath Weapon and Damage Resistance traits as well as your appearance.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy based on your draconic ancestry.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

name: Dwarf
description: Bold and hardy folk living mostly in mountains and underground cities

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: You have Resistance to Poison damage. You also have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Poisoned condition.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 again whenever you gain a level.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: As a Bonus Action, you gain Tremorsense with a range of 60 feet for 10 minutes. You must be on a stone surface or touching a stone surface to use this Tremorsense. You can use this Bonus Action a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

name: Elf
description: Graceful and long-lived, with keen senses and a deep connection to magic

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

traits.name: Elven Lineage
traits.description: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose a lineage from the Elven Lineages table. You gain the level 1 benefit of that lineage. When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell from your lineage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation.

name: Gnome
description: Small folk with a natural curiosity and aptitude for magic and invention

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

traits.name: Gnomish Cunning
traits.description: You have Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

traits.name: Gnomish Lineage
traits.description: You are part of a lineage that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose Forest Gnome or Rock Gnome lineage, each providing different magical abilities.

name: Goliath
description: Towering nomads with stone-like skin and incredible physical prowess

traits.name: Giant Ancestry
traits.description: You are descended from Giants. Choose one supernatural boon from your ancestry (Cloud's Jaunt, Fire's Burn, Frost's Chill, Hill's Tumble, Stone's Endurance, or Storm's Thunder). You can use the chosen benefit a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Large Form
traits.description: As a Bonus Action, you change your size to Large along with anything you're wearing. If you lack the room to become Large, your size doesn't change. While Large, you have Advantage on Strength checks, and your Speed increases by 10 feet. This transformation lasts for 10 minutes or until you use a Bonus Action to end it. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.description: You have Advantage on any ability check you make to end the Grappled condition. You also count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity.

name: Halfling
description: Small, nimble folk known for their luck and courage

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Frightened condition.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is a size larger than you, but you can't stop in the same space.

traits.name: Luck
traits.description: When you roll a 1 on the d20 of a D20 Test, you can reroll the die, and you must use the new roll.

traits.name: Naturally Stealthy
traits.description: You can take the Hide action even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

name: Human
description: Versatile and ambitious people who adapt quickly to any environment
size_description: Medium (about 4–7 feet tall) or Small (about 2–4 feet tall), chosen when you select this species

traits.name: Resourceful
traits.description: You gain Heroic Inspiration whenever you finish a Long Rest.

traits.name: Skillful
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.description: You gain an Origin feat of your choice. Skilled is recommended.

name: Orc
description: Fierce warriors with incredible endurance and determination

traits.name: Adrenaline Rush
traits.description: You can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action. When you do so, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Short or Long Rest.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 120 feet.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.description: When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

name: Tiefling
description: Humanoids with fiendish heritage, marked by their supernatural legacy
size_description: Medium (about 4–7 feet tall) or Small (about 3–4 feet tall), chosen when you select this species

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

traits.name: Fiendish Legacy
traits.description: You are the recipient of a legacy that grants you supernatural abilities. Choose a legacy from the Fiendish Legacies table. You gain the level 1 benefit of the chosen legacy. When you reach character levels 3 and 5, you learn a higher-level spell from your legacy.

traits.name: Otherworldly Presence
traits.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the spell uses the same spellcasting ability you use for your Fiendish Legacy trait.
